metadata.title: USN-6668-1 -- python-openstackclient vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that when python-openstackclient attempted to delete a non-existing access rule, it would delete another existing access rule instead, contrary to expectations.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6668-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-openstackclient - 5.8.0-0ubuntu1.1 python-openstackclient-doc - 5.8.0-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
